thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 3 of 899
thread.title: Jet Jenkins
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Jet Jenkins

author: Jet Jenkins
title: Jet Jenkins
text: That's all there is to it, really. Every now and then there will be a bundle with one game that I really want and would gladly pay the price of said bundle for that individual game. I didn't rate the site 5 stars 'cause it doesn't happen that often, even though I don't think that's completely within their grasp. It's still definitely worth keeping an eye on. Also paying for things is fast and easy if you have Paypal. Personally I'd like it if there were more obscure, Japanese titles on sale (Like Earth Defense Force) just to have a place to get them cheap.I don't see a lot of other sites doing that.
